document_data.mainbody:
he House of Morning was a temple of Lathander, the only shrine of significance in Feather Falls, located within Featherdale in the late 14 century DR. It was run by Morninglord Jallian Horgontivar, who himself was supported by a clergy of 16 clerics and acolytes devoted to the deity of "dawn" and "light".
The temple rented out spartan rooms at the cost of 1 gp per head per night. They also issued loans to local businesses.
